name: Ariados
flavorText:
It spins string
not only from its
rear but also from its mouth. It is
hard to tell which
end is which.

previous.name: Spinarak
previous.flavorText:
It lies still in
the same pose for
days in its web, waiting for its
unsuspecting prey
to wander close.

next.name: Crobat
next.flavorText:
It flies so si­
lently through the
dark on its four wings that it may
not be noticed
even when nearby.
